Title: Guzaarish
Writer: Sanjay Leela Bhansali (screenplay), Bhavani Iyer (dialogue), Bhavani Iyer (screenplay), Vibhu Puri (dialogue), Turaz (lyrics)
Actors: Hrithik Roshan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Shernaz Patel, Aditya Roy Kapoor
Plot: A paralyzed Magician-turned-Radio Jockey files a Petition in Court seeking permission to end his life.
